Text: RE Pricing Cc PST The deal has been booked into Tagg I have entered the ED ECC leg it is VS I believe Albert will be entering the counterparty leg Chad Original Message From Joslyn Kate Sent Friday July PM To Mckay Jonathan Cc Bruce Chad Luc Albert Subject RE Pricing Jon Lindsay Park have closed Please book the deal Thanks Kate Original Message From Mckay Jonathan Sent Friday July AM To Joslyn Kate Subject FW Pricing Kate Greg asked me to get a price for Lindsay Park first thing in the morning Given their load profile we would be offered at gj for supply one year out of August Please let me know if you need any thing else Best Regards Jon Original Message From Frers Greg Sent Thursday July PM To Mckay Jonathan Subject RE Pricing Jon Im not going to be in tomorrow and Kate Joslyn is going to close the Lindsay Park deal for me Could you Email pricing to her directly instead of to me Thanks Jon Hey if you ever need some tickets to go to a game let me know Greg Original Message From Mckay Jonathan Sent Thursday July PM To Frers Greg Subject RE Pricing We would be offered at right now but like all things what goes up must come down We moved down in the front part of the curve but the back has not followed as quickly I would expect we will have a good hedging opportunity the next couple of days and then rally after that Regards Jon Original Message From Frers Greg Sent Thursday July PM To Mckay Jonathan Subject Pricing Jon Lindsay Park is being a pain in the butt could you update me on price I know we are up today when do you think prices may get back down to range again Start Date August Thanks Gregory Frers Enron Direct Sales Manager Suite Encor Place th Avenue SW Calgary Alberta TP G Ph Fax mailto
